title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 616.23 - Location of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 616.23 - Location of records

State Regulations

Records shall be made available at the main office of the
department, and whenever practicable at a regional office convenient to the
requester. The addresses for these locations are listed in section
616.3
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
616.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
